product_name: CliniqueDramatically Different Lipstick Shaping Lip Colour
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Dramatically Different Lipstick Shaping Lip Colour is rich, hydrating, and infused with skincare for lips.
details: DetailsBenefits3D pearl center core instantly sculpts and contours, providing an immediate appearance of a smoother pout.Over time, lip definition is improved.Available in a remarkable range of shades.Dermatologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesFragranceItem 2533214How To UseApply lipstick to clean, bare lips. Can be worn with lip liner. Remove with Clinique Take The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes & LipsIngredientsCetyl Ethylhexanoate, Ozokerite, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Polybutene, Beeswax\Cera, Alba\Cire D'abeille, Polyethylene, PPG-51/Smdi Copolymer, Silica, Microcrystalline Wax\Cera Microcristallina\Cire Microcristalline, Bisdiglyceryl, Polyacyladipate-2, Centella Asiatica (Hydrocotyl) Extract, Hibiscus Abelmoschus Extract, Coleus Barbatus Extract, Helianthus, Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-10 Heptahydroxystearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Tribehenin, Squalane, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Sorbitan Isostearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Water\Aqua\Eau, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Alumina, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Carmine (CI 75470), Red 27 (CI 45410), Red 6 (CI 15850), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 21 (CI 45380), Orange 5.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply lipstick to clean, bare lips. Can be worn with lip liner. Remove with Clinique Take The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes & Lips
ingredients: Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate. May Contain: Mica
Orange 5.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Love the color and doesn't dry out lips
reviews.comments: Love the color and this lipstick does not cause my lips to dry out.

reviews.headline: I've bought 6 so far!!
reviews.comments: I love the color of this-it's shiny, it's pretty and I'm on my 6th tube! I have very fair skin at it looks very good on me! Not happy it went up $3 though…..

reviews.headline: I will buy this lipstick over and over again.
reviews.comments: I've used Clinique for many years. There are certain products that must be Clinique. I LOVE the brown sugar lipstick.

reviews.headline: Best lipstick ever
reviews.comments: I don't wear lipstick, only lip balms. I liked the color Barely because it was a nice nude, and the nudes I've tried just aren't good. Clinique did it again! Best nude lip color ever. I'm never changing. This is the best.

reviews.headline: Best lipstick
reviews.comments: This is my favorite lipstick. The color is just right and it keeps my lips soft and smooth!

reviews.headline: Great lipstick formula for sensitive skin girlies!
reviews.comments: No fragrance is a must for me and this formula is great. Creamy, smooth texture glides on and stays put for quite a while! I maybe reapply once or twice in the course of a 12-hr day. I pirchased the color All Heart and its a beautiful coral pink color - perfect for my warm skin tone and freckles. I will definitely be repurchase!

reviews.headline: My favorite color of lipstick
reviews.comments: Very neutral color

reviews.headline: Mold
reviews.comments: This was one of my favorite color lipstick until I rolled it out one day and saw a bunch of tiny bumps that looked like mold, and it didnt have that on my first few uses. Didn't keep it in a hot or damp location either.

reviews.headline: I'll buy this again.
reviews.comments: Love this lipstick.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again!
reviews.comments: It's a beautiful shade and it has moisturizing properties included in the formula. It is my all time favorite color and it never fails to impress me. I have been wearing it since the 1980's.

reviews.headline: Love this color
reviews.comments: Have been using this color  forever, hope they never discontinue it

reviews.headline: Really natural looking
reviews.comments: Gives a nice,natural hint of color.Stays on pretty well.

reviews.headline: Love the color!
reviews.comments: This lipstick is so pretty! It doesn't dry out my lips to bad and last a good amount of time.

reviews.headline: Bamboo pink
reviews.comments: I used to use this shade in high school. Its so beautiful, timeless and worked for everyone. Bamboo pink doesn't get enough praise when it deserves to go viral.

reviews.headline: Color raspberry glacé
reviews.comments: I like this lipstick.  The color is just right. I like that it's hydrating.

reviews.headline: Color Pink Bamboo
reviews.comments: Pretty color but too light for me.  I have to add a little bit darker color in order to see it.

reviews.headline: Love this Clinique lipstick and Raspberry Glace is my jam.
reviews.comments: I am disappointed that I could not use my Ulta $5 coupon.

reviews.headline: I've been using this color and lipstick for years.
reviews.comments: Needs to be reapplied often.

reviews.headline: Shade "Barely" 01
reviews.comments: Clinique if your out there listening I beg of you to never discontinue your lipstick shade "Barely" 01. This is the ONLY lipstick on the market that perfectly suits me. I have searched high and low to find a light cool toned neutral pink shade that doesnt run orangey or warm. I am a pale girly and all my pale girlies know its a struggle out here. Please please please never discontinue this shade.

reviews.headline: Fades
reviews.comments: The lipstick fades rather fast

faceoff_positive.comments: I have tried to find this color everywhere, and it is no where to be found, this color will compliment any skin tone, and any color eye-shadow, blush etc.....It just makes me look beautiful like no other color! it is for everyone! and its nice and moist, and re- applies beautifully!!! I recommend you try it too!
faceoff_positive.headline: tenderheart!

faceoff_negative.comments: After visiting 2 store clinique counters to get assistance on colors,  I eventually purchased Dramatically Different lipstick in Surprise online which the Consultant in the store who tested it on my hand assured me would be a good color. When I tried it on my lips after receiving my product in the mail, it was barely noticeable- no color. Again, so disappointed  as I asked the Consultant if it would be a noticeable color and was assured it would be. The creamy center, although  moisturizing, is not an improvement as there's just less lipstick color. Also I was advised this would last 8 hours and not come off. It lasted barely a couple hours and that was with no eating, drinking, etc. I have not had a problem with other brands just disappearing and fading away to nothing. I used to wear SASSY SPICE. Ever since that was discontinued I've searched for a suitable replacement.  Different consultants have advised me to use Shy, Surprise, Merlot and several other colors. They said each would be close but none of them have been. I'm continually just disappointed.  The good news is I was smart enough to try this color immediately upon receiving and call immediately to request a return which I just completed. I was approved to return the product and get a refund.  But I still have no lipstick! Please bring back SASSY SPICE. Please if there really is a replacement for it, let me know what it is, and maybe make a chart available when colors are being discontinued so advisors and customers know what an option is. I like Clinique products in general but the lipstick is just too hard these days. Also, in my locality, the delivery company is Ontrac and they are terrible with mis deliveries.  I've called before and let you know but there's been no change. My package has been noted as delivered days before it shows up at my door, left down the street and most recentlythe packagingit arrived in was stained, smelly and torn. Please use another carrier.Thanks for listening.
faceoff_negative.headline: Still trying to find a good color!

rollup.name: Dramatically Different Lipstick Shaping Lip Colour
